requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: intel x86 family, 2Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: opengl 2.0 supported graphics card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i3-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 620
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: you choose
  • Additional Notes: a 16:9 resolution is recommended but not necessary, (Be careful! a 64 bit cpu is highly recommended! the game also works on some 32 bit cpu but not all! unfortunally i can't say exactly on wich 32 bit cpu the game runs)
